content: knitted suit for baby in drops merino extra fine piece is knitted with textured pattern and hood size premature to 4 years drops design pattern me-069-by yarn group b size <0 0/1 - 1/3 - 6/9 - 12/18 months 2 - 3/4 years size equals approx kid s height in cm 40/44 48/52 - 56/62 - 68/74 - 80/86 92 - 98/104 **materials** drops merino extra fine from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 200 250-300-350-400 400-450 g colour 15 light grey green **knitting gauge ** 21 stitches in width and 28 row vertically with a 1 = 10 x 10 cm needles drops circular needle size 4 mm length 60 or 80 cm drops mother-of-pearl button flower white no 600 4 5-6-6-6 6-7 pieces
